lines.i: Indication of whether this set of vital signs was obtained prior to the documenting EMS unit's care

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.29"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11131)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67518-1" Obtained prior to units EMS care NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10273)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:11132)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.02
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11131)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67518-1" Obtained prior to units EMS care NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10273)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:11132)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.02
